task.title: Publishing and customizing output
task.shortdesc: You can produce several different kinds of output from DITA, and customize the output for XHTML.

context.p: For information on producing output from DITA topics or maps see the IDWB Process and Command Guide. When producing XHTML output, you can add headers, footers, and CSS references. Make sure that your additions do not break IBM guidelines, and that all information in your information set is being built with the same options.

You can also customize the XHTML output more extensively, for example to construct different kinds of summary tables for your reference content or add dynamic behavior. See the DITA customization site for information on customization policies and procedures.
